text: Sri Widoyati Wiratmo Soekito (1929 - 1982) was the first woman appointed as a Judge of the Supreme Court of Indonesia, which occurred in 1968. She was Muslim. ==Further reading== *Anak dan wanita dalam hukum [Children and women in law], by Sri Widoyati Wiratmo Soekito, Jakarta: Institute for Research, Education and Economic and Social Affairs, 1983 *Bibliography of Sri Widoyati Wiratmo Soekito ==References== Category:Indonesian judges Category:20th- century judges Category:1929 births Category:1982 deaths Category:20th-century women judges
title: Sri Widoyati Wiratmo Soekito
